events.APPOINTMENT_MODIFY: Any time an appointment is modified
events.PATIENT_MODIFY: Any time a patient is modified
events.TASK_MODIFY: Any time a task is modified and Any time creation, modification and deletion of task notes, associated task items
events.APPOINTMENT_DELETE: Any time an appointment is deleted
events.PATIENT_CREATE: Any time a patient is created
events.CASH_PAYMENT_DELETE: Any time a patient payment is deleted
events.PATIENT_MEDICATION_MODIFY: Any time a patient medication is modified
events.PATIENT_MEDICATION_CREATE: Any time a patient medication is created
events.APPOINTMENT_BILLING_STATUS_BI: Any time an appointment's billing status reaches 'Bill Insurance'
events.LINE_ITEM_TRANSACTION_DELETE: Any time a line item transaction is deleted
events.PATIENT_PROBLEM_MODIFY: Any time a patient problem is modified
events.LINE_ITEM_DELETE: Any time a line item is deleted
events.LINE_ITEM_CREATE: Any time a line item is created
events.PATIENT_PROBLEM_CREATE: Any time a patient problem is created
events.PATIENT_FLAG_CREATE: Any time a patient flag is created
events.APPOINTMENT_BILLING_STATUS_RTB: Any time an appointment's billing status reaches 'Ready to Bill'
events.CLINICAL_NOTE_UNLOCK: Any time a clinical note is unlocked
events.PATIENT_ALLERGY_MODIFY: Any time a patient allergy is modified
events.TASK_DELETE: Any time a task is deleted
events.PATIENT_FLAG_MODIFY: Any time a patient flag is modified
events.PATIENT_ALLERGY_CREATE: Any time a patient allergy is created
events.VACCINE_ADMINISTERED: Any time a vaccine consent form is signed
events.CLINICAL_NOTE_LOCK: Any time a clinical note is locked
events.LINE_ITEM_MODIFY: Any time a line item is modified
events.APPOINTMENT_CREATE: Any time an appointment is created
events.TASK_CREATE: Any time a task is created
